```{r}
#| label: setup
#| include: FALSE
library (tidyverse)
library (PxWebApiData)
library(readxl)
library(purrr)
library(dineq)
library(psych)
library(flextable)
```

```{r}
# Merging datasett gini og tidyjoined 
GDP <- select(tidyjoined, NUTS2, Time, GDP_Capita)
GDP_per_capita_2017 <- filter(GDP, Time == 2017)
```

```{r}
GDP_2017 <- group_by(GDP, NUTS2, Time) 
# Summarize scores per name
summary_df <- GDP %>%
  group_by(NUTS2) %>%
  summarise(
    total_score = sum(GDP_Capita),
    .groups = 'drop'  # optional, removes grouping after summarise
  )

```

```{r}
#Fetching change in GDP
GDP <- tidyjoined %>%
  select(NUTS2, Country, Time, `GDP Million EUR`, Population) %>%
  group_by(NUTS2, Country, Time) %>%
  summarise(
    "N2GDPSUM" = sum(`GDP Million EUR`),
    "N2POPSUM" = sum(Population),
    "N2GDPCAP"  = (N2GDPSUM * 1000000)/ N2POPSUM)
```
